alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 10:45AM CDT until May 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. .Minor flooding impacts are expected to continue. This forecast takes into account forecasted rainfall through 7 AM Thursday. Additional rainfall is expected after Thursday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River AT Alvarado. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Storm sewer flood gates are closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 105.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 106.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
